product_name: Swix Alpine Ski Pole Bag - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Swix Alpine Ski pole bag is sized for carrying multiple sets of poles to the hill, and it's fully padded to protect your gear whether you travel by plane, train or bus. Durable polyester construction and rugged carrying handles guarantee years of use. Circular zip opening at the top for easy loading and unloading; non-slip padded shoulder strap; fits up to 5 pairs of 140cm poles. Closeout.
short_description: The Swix Alpine Ski pole bag is sized for carrying multiple sets of poles to the hill, and it's fully padded to protect your gear whether you travel by plane, train or bus.
